title: typeface form the film pleasentville
content:
Hi Was wodnering if someone could help. Im looking for the typeface used for the title of the film Pleasentville. Can be seen here:

[http://www.bluebeat.com/i/an/7/8/3/6/2/l26387.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080929085113/http:/www.bluebeat.com/i/an/7/8/3/6/2/l26387.jpg "http://www.bluebeat.com/i/an/7/8/3/6/2/l26387.jpg")

any help would be great

cheers in advance

ade

 [‹ GUCCI BY GUCCI logo font](http://web.archive.org/web/20080929085113/http:/typophile.com/node/47263 "Go to previous forum topic") [Type ID help ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080929085113/http:/typophile.com/node/47061 "Go to next forum topic")
author: kinski2008

comments.content: Superb many thanks for the quick response
